statements: SELECT course_name, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM course_schedule WHERE faculty_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT course_name, room_id, day_of_week FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Thursday' ORDER BY room_id DESC
SELECT course_name, faculty_id, start_time, end_time FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 201 AND room_id = 105
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND faculty_id = 102
SELECT course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE start_time >= '09:00:00' AND end_time <= '12:00:00' ORDER BY room_id ASC
SELECT course_name, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM course_schedule WHERE faculty_id = 1001 ORDER BY day_of_week DESC, start_time ASC
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE room_id = 2005 AND day_of_week = 'Wednesday' ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT course_name, faculty_id, day_of_week FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND start_time >= '09:00:00' ORDER BY faculty_id, start_time
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE start_time < '12:00:00' AND day_of_week IN ('Monday', 'Friday') ORDER BY course_name
SELECT course_name, faculty_id FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Thursday' AND start_time BETWEEN '08:30:00' AND '15:00:00' ORDER BY faculty_id DESC, start_time
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, timeslot_id FROM Course WHERE room_id = 101;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE room_id = 102 AND timeslot_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM Course WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE instructor_id = 1 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM Course WHERE room_id = 5 AND timeslot_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, day_of_week FROM Course INNER JOIN Timeslot ON Course.timeslot_id = Timeslot.timeslot_id WHERE Course.room_id = 2;
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_time, end_time FROM Course INNER JOIN Timeslot ON Course.timeslot_id = Timeslot.timeslot_id WHERE Timeslot.day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_courses, instructor_id FROM Course GROUP BY instructor_id HAVING total_courses > 2;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Courses;
SELECT room_id, room_name, capacity FROM Rooms WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM Faculty WHERE department = 'Math';
SELECT faculty_name, department FROM Faculty ORDER BY faculty_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, faculty_name FROM Courses INNER JOIN Faculty ON Courses.faculty_id = Faculty.faculty_id;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, faculty_id FROM Courses WHERE faculty_id = 3;
SELECT faculty_name, department FROM Faculty WHERE department = 'Science';
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM Rooms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Courses JOIN Faculty ON Courses.faculty_id = Faculty.faculty_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course;
SELECT room_id, room_capacity, room_location FROM Room;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT faculty_name, faculty_department FROM Faculty;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT room_capacity, room_location FROM Room WHERE room_capacity > 50;
SELECT faculty_name, faculty_department FROM Faculty WHERE faculty_department = 'Computer Science';

SELECT Schedule.schedule_time, Course.course_name, Faculty.faculty_name, Room.room_location FROM Schedule JOIN Course ON Schedule.course_id = Course.course_id JOIN Faculty ON Schedule.faculty_id = Faculty.faculty_id JOIN Room ON Schedule.room_id = Room.room_id ORDER BY Schedule.schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT room_name, building, capacity FROM rooms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT faculty_name FROM faculty WHERE department = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY faculty_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, course_id, room_id FROM schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses;
SELECT faculty_id, faculty_name, department FROM faculty ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT room_name, building, capacity FROM rooms WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY building ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, course_id, room_id, faculty_id, schedule_date FROM schedules WHERE course_id = 3;
